title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Adaptive Learning Design and Project-Based Mathematics Education in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational mathematics knowledge and basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can solve project-based math problems by applying the five core design principles of adaptive learning systems: goal customization, real-time monitoring, automated feedback, data-driven improvement, and flexible content structure.
Using analytical tools provided by an adaptive learning platform, learners can diagnose personalized learning paths and achieve an accuracy target of 80% or higher.

Through PBL (Project-Based Learning) activities, learners can complete three or more projects applying mathematical modeling techniques to solve real-world problems and earn a grade of B or higher in peer and summative evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
